description:
"I'm a little bit nervous," Matt said as he was sitting on the sofa next to Jason.
"Why?"
"This guy is huge!" he said, referring to Jason (whose chest he was gently rubbing). "He's twice my size!"
I wouldn't say "twice," but Jason is definitely taller than Matt.
"I usually fuck little, petite girls," Matt said. "So this is pretty new to me."
"I bet you can make his toes curl," our camera guy said to Matt. "Yours always do!"
"Yeah, my toes definitely curl," Matt said. "Everything kind of just reverberates down my legs."
And then Matt said something very sweet. He wanted to make sure things went well for Jason.
"I want him to have a good time," Matt said...
title: Matt & Jason
